A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everybody knows that the dice are loaded\, Everybody knows the good guys lost... Ohh Leonard.  This pretentious millennial edition version of Star Wars riddled with social agenda themes\, bad cringe-worthy jokes and utter disregard for George Lucas' creation can only be loved by those void of cinematic history.   We go to the movies for escapism\, a distraction from realties\, political agendas and divisiveness.   If Rian Johnson & Disney wanted to inspire dreams\, then they failed miserably with this hack of a storyline.    Similar to how the Oscars are loosing viewership\, so is Hollywood in general.  A shadow of its former \"dream factory\" status.  Full of political agendas and correctness.   \"A long time ago in a galaxy far far away....\" they \"phone calls\" and \"fuel issues\".   If you enjoy rolling your eyes every 5 mins\, go see this twat of a movie.    Way to go Disney\, you've ruined my childhood dreams.
